meanings.sent1: The misprogrammed robot kept bumping into walls.
meanings.sent2: The misprogrammed computer displayed error messages.
meanings.sent3: The misprogrammed toy car hilariously spun in circles.
meanings.sent4: Her misprogrammed GPS led us in circles all day.
meanings.sent5: The misprogrammed alarm clock woke me up at midnight instead of morning.

meanings.definition: To have made a mistake in programming.
meanings.sent1: He misprogrammed the security system, causing it to malfunction.
meanings.sent2: She misprogrammed the microwave timer and burnt her popcorn.
meanings.sent3: The chef misprogrammed the oven, turning the cake into a brick.
meanings.sent4: Their misprogrammed drone flew off course and crashed into a tree.
meanings.sent5: I misprogrammed the TV remote, and now it won't change channels.
